text: Jessica Oyelowo (born Jessica Watson in 1978) is an English actress. She is known for her roles in Murphy's Law, Mayo, and in Hex. She studied at Woodbridge School. She was a member of the National Youth Music Theatre. She lives in Los Angeles with her husband, actor David Oyelowo, and their three sons. ==Other websites== *BBC Mayo *tv.com * Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
title: Jessica Oyelowo
